nodes.text: At some point during the Galactic Civil War, an Iyra with at least five tentacles was suspended in a cage at a cantina known as Shilley's on the planet Questal. In one instance, the Iyra wore a brassiere around its trunk and dangled another from a tentacle stretched through the bars of the cage.

The caged Iyra appears in an illustration by Andrew Bates and Ramón Pérez for the adventure The Game Chambers of Questal. Although the adventure was first published in 1990 for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game line, the illustration is unique to the revised version published as part of Classic Adventures: Volume Five in 1998.
